text: Kuma shi ne wanda Ya halicci sammai da ƙasa a cikin kwanaki shida, kuma Al'arshinSa ya kasance akan ruwa, domin Ya jarraba ku, wannan ne daga cikinku mafi kyawon aiki. Kuma haƙiƙa idan ka ce: "Lalle ku waɗanda ake tayarwa ne a bayan mutuwa," haƙiƙa waɗanda suka kafirta suna cewa: "Wannan bai zama ba face sihiri bayyananne
